languages.text: {n}Префект кривится.{/n} "Остаток жизни быть избавленной от пытки наблюдения за тем, как вы уничтожаете владения Империума? Это награда, Вольный Торговец. Впрочем, вы правы — каталогизация летописей поставок давно нуждалась в усиленном надзоре, и с этим в ваших владениях не справится никто, кроме меня".

traits.locale_text: "Я с достоинством приму на себя священный долг учета прихода и расхода. К тому же, каталогизация летописей поставок давно нуждалась в усиленном надзоре. Мало кто способен справиться с этим лучше меня".

languages.text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."
languages.original_text: {n}Префект кривится.{/n} "Остаток жизни быть избавленной от пытки наблюдения за тем, как вы уничтожаете владения Империума? Это награда, Вольный Торговец. Впрочем, вы правы — каталогизация летописей поставок давно нуждалась в усиленном надзоре, и с этим в ваших владениях не справится никто, кроме меня".

But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

{n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin verzieht ihr Gesicht zu einer Grimasse.{/n} "Damit ich bis zum Ende meiner Tage nicht mehr mitansehen muss, wie Ihr die Territorien des Imperiums in den Ruin treibt? Das ist eine Belohnung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber Ihr habt vermutlich recht ... die Katalogisierung der Frachtchroniken bedarf längst einer eingehenden Prüfung, und in Eurem ganzen Reich ist niemand außer mir in der Lage, diese Funktion angemessen auszufüllen."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin verzieht ihr Gesicht zu einer Grimasse.{/n} "Damit ich bis zum Ende meiner Tage nicht mehr mitansehen muss, wie Ihr die Territorien des Imperiums in den Ruin treibt? Das ist eine Belohnung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber Ihr habt vermutlich recht ... die Katalogisierung der Frachtchroniken bedarf längst einer eingehenden Prüfung, und in Eurem ganzen Reich ist niemand außer mir in der Lage, diese Funktion angemessen auszufüllen."

languages.text: {n}La préfète grimace.{/n} « Vous m'épargnez la torture d'avoir à passer le reste de ma vie à vous regarder conduire les territoires de l'Imperium à la ruine ? C'est une récompense, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais je suppose que vous avez raison. Le catalogage des chroniques de livraison est un art qui a depuis longtemps besoin d'une supervision rigoureuse, et je suis la seule dans tout votre domaine à pouvoir m'acquitter de cette tâche adéquatement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète grimace.{/n} « Vous m'épargnez la torture d'avoir à passer le reste de ma vie à vous regarder conduire les territoires de l'Imperium à la ruine ? C'est une récompense, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais je suppose que vous avez raison. Le catalogage des chroniques de livraison est un art qui a depuis longtemps besoin d'une supervision rigoureuse, et je suis la seule dans tout votre domaine à pouvoir m'acquitter de cette tâche adéquatement. »

languages.text: {n}行政官脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“你这么做，是为了让我不必亲眼看着你把帝国的领土化为废墟吗？对我而言，这其实是赏赐，行商浪人。不过，我猜你说得没错。为所有资源分门别类，这是一种艺术，这项工作早就该得到严格监督了。在你的王朝之中，除了我之外，没有任何人能胜任这项工作。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“你这么做，是为了让我不必亲眼看着你把帝国的领土化为废墟吗？对我而言，这其实是赏赐，行商浪人。不过，我猜你说得没错。为所有资源分门别类，这是一种艺术，这项工作早就该得到严格监督了。在你的王朝之中，除了我之外，没有任何人能胜任这项工作。”

languages.text: {n}La Prefecta hace una mueca.{/n} «¿Me ahorra una vida de verle arruinar los territorios del Imperium uno tras otro? Comerciante Independiente, eso es una recompensa. Pero supongo que tiene razón: catalogar los envíos es un arte que necesita una rigurosa supervisión, y soy la única en todos sus dominios que puede realizar adecuadamente esa función».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Prefecta hace una mueca.{/n} «¿Me ahorra una vida de verle arruinar los territorios del Imperium uno tras otro? Comerciante Independiente, eso es una recompensa. Pero supongo que tiene razón: catalogar los envíos es un arte que necesita una rigurosa supervisión, y soy la única en todos sus dominios que puede realizar adecuadamente esa función».

languages.text: {n}総監はにやりと笑った。{/n}「君が帝国の領土を破滅させるのを、一生見なくて済むと？ローグトレーダー、それはご褒美だね。だが、君の言う通りだ。積荷の記録をまとめるのは、厳しい監視が必要な職務で、全保護領でこの役割をちゃんと果たせるのは、私以外にいない」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

traits.locale_text: {n}総監はにやりと笑った。{/n}「君が帝国の領土を破滅させるのを、一生見なくて済むと？ローグトレーダー、それはご褒美だね。だが、君の言う通りだ。積荷の記録をまとめるのは、厳しい監視が必要な職務で、全保護領でこの役割をちゃんと果たせるのは、私以外にいない」

languages.text: {n}Prefektin yüzü acıyla kasılıyor.{/n} "Ömrümün sonuna kadar İmparatorluk'a ait olan bölgelerin altını üstüne getirmeni azabından kurtulacak mıyım? Bu bir lütuftur Hür Tacir. Lakin haklısınız. Sevkiyat vakayinamelerini fihristleme sanatı, uzun zamandır sıkı bir denetim gerektiriyordu. Ayrıca ben hariç hükümranlığınızdaki hiç kimse bu vazifeyi layığıyla yerine getiremez."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect grimaces.{/n} "To be spared for the rest of my life from having to watch you bring the Imperium's territories to ruin? That is a reward, Rogue Trader. But I suppose you are right — cataloguing shipment chronicles is an art long overdue for some rigorous supervision, and none except me in your entire domain is capable of performing this function adequately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefektin yüzü acıyla kasılıyor.{/n} "Ömrümün sonuna kadar İmparatorluk'a ait olan bölgelerin altını üstüne getirmeni azabından mı kurtulacağım yani? Bu bir lütuftur Hür Tacir. Lakin haklısınız. Sevkiyat vakayinamelerini fihristleme sanatı, uzun zamandır sıkı bir denetim gerektirmektedir. Ayrıca, sizin hükümranlığınızdaki ben hariç hiç kimse bu vazifeyi layığıyla yerine getiremez."
